title: Congatec Announces New SMARC Module for High-Performance AI Edge Applications
description: Congatec unveiled last month its latest SMARC module 2.1 Computer-on-Module powered by Texas Instruments Jacinto 7 TDA4x or DRA8x processors optimized for high-performance AI edge applications with a focus on ultra-low power consumption. The latest conga-STDA4 Computer-on-Modules adhere to the SMARC Module 2.1 specification and feature Texas Instruments’ Jacinto 7 TDA4VM or DRA829J processors with […]
